Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

 Galvatron was hit by the blast. The blue armor shattered acorss his left 
ribs and left a depp internal wound. The healing began but not in time. He  
started the procedure. His tail gre in size. 5 times bigger then the bot. His 
tail was still aroung the bot...... the tail opened up at the wounded end to 
show a gappeing hole. It covered the bot and lifted closeing immeiatly. The 
bot was trapped in his tail. His insides now semi adapted to the bots energy 
due to his mech fluid taken from him. All he was doing was staling till it 
had finished adapting. Red beams came from all sides and tore the bots spark 
from its body. It ejected the bots spark. His body now limp.a cacoon 
surronded them both and the adaption began with out any way for the spark to 
reenter to get back to the body. It would survive if it found a body fast 
enough... (and killing your char is not a mode its lllegal you just have to 
accept it. In this post your char will live if you get him a new body. I 
believe dachande was looking for a spark to fill his knew bot anyway....)

--part1_90.eb143ca.278f61c0_boundary
